item.title: Image to ASCII for 16x2 Character Display Matrix
item.description:
A while ago, I embarked on a personal project that combined my love for electronics and creative coding: building a large-scale display matrix out of 96 individual character LCD screens. The result was a massive 8x12 grid capable of displaying text, but I quickly realised I wanted to show more than just wordsâ€”I wanted to display images.

The challenge? These are text-only displays. You can’t just send them a JPEG. My solution was to go retro and use a classic form of digital art: ASCII art.

item.title: Coming soon
item.description: Stayed tuned for details about my various projects!
